Subject: Require script for the uninstallation of the client
Description:
Hello Team,

One of our customers require bulk unisntallation script.

Kindly do the needful.
What_We_Know__c:
Client got back stating they can't use the uninstall option from the console for some reason.
Asked for more details to investigate.
Next_Steps__c: Sent mail explaining how to do it and to provide more details with relevant screenshots. Will wait for their response.
Solution_Comment__c:
Gave the client the easier way to uninstall the client rather than doing it through a script or 3rd party solution.
Closing ticket.
